column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ nwansema fun ma eduforafo ne seradze yi nka bɔn no: dɛmara so na nkwaseadze kakrabaa bor nyansa na enyidzi do."
"Nyimpa nyansafo n'akoma dze no kɔ n'abanyimfa; na ɔkwasea n'akoma dze no kɔ n'abankum."
"Mpo sɛ ɔkwasea nantsew kwan biara do a
column4: na ɔda no ho edzi dɛ ɔkwasea a."

column2: "Sɛ otumfo no sunsum soɛr tsia wo a
column3: mma mmfi w'ananmu; na ngyaamu dwedwe mfom pii."

column2: "Mbusu bi wɔ hɔ a mehu no wɔ wi ase a ɔtse dɛ mfom a ofi otumfo hɔ ba."

column3: na ahenmba a wɔnenam dɛ nkowaa wɔ asaase do."
ɔbɔtɔ mu; na obiara a obubu ban mu no
wɔdze bepira no; na nyia ɔpaa ndua no

column4: ɔnodze ɔwɔ dɛ wɔma no ahoɔdzen kɛse: naaso hu no dɛ nyansa bɛma esi wo yie."

column2: "Sɛ abowatsena sɔw ansaana wɔakyer no nkaber a
column3: nna mfaso biara nnyi nkaberkyerfo no ho."

column2: "Nyimpa nyansafo n'anomu nsɛm yɛ adom; na ɔkwasea dze

column3: na n'ewiei no yɛ abɔdam emumuyɛ."

column2: "Ɔma n'asɛm so dɔɔ so: naaso nyimpa nnyim dza ɔbɛba; na dza obesi n'ekyir aba no

column3: due! Aber a wo hen yɛ abofra
osiarfo nye wo oo! Ber a wo hen yɛ ekunyin ba
column4: na w'asafohemfo dzidzi ber a ɔsɛ dze nya ahoɔdzen na wɔnnyɛ asabokwafo!"

column2: "Akwadwer ara ntsi na nkurii pa bɔ mu; na nsamugow na ɔma ɔdan nwin."

column3: na nsa ma ɔbra mu enyigye: na sika bua adze nyinara."
mpo wɔ w'adwen mu; na mma nndom obirɛmpɔn wɔ w'adankyir: na wimu anoma dze ndze no bɔkɔ
column4: na dza otuatua ntɛkyerɛ bɔkɔ akɛka asɛm no."
